task_description: {'component_name': 'Main Container for QuizMaster React', 'description': 'Primary container for QuizMaster React implementation: Quizverse is a React.js-based quiz application that allows users to take a multiple-choice quiz, view their score, see correct answers, and track high scores. It features a timer, progress bar, and is mobile responsive. All questions are stored locally in JSON format.', 'framework': 'react', 'platform': 'web'}
